title: Precisely In Love With You - Novel Updates
author: 莫縈
description:
He, born with a golden spoon in his mouth, believes that love is something to fight for.

No one knows that she's from a prestigious family. Because of her mother’s past, she is afraid of love, but because of him, she is eager to love.

She never thought that she would one day fall in love, but his advances gradually lowered her guard.

Now, only the previous generation’s grudges are an obstacle in their love.>
